target_sites.name: mlbprediction
target_sites.angle: Analytics, advanced stats (xBA, WAR, xFIP), data-driven

target_sites.name: bestmlbhandicapper
target_sites.angle: Sharp money, expert handicapping, situational angles

news_items.headline: Twins' Joe Ryan gets MRI, has lower back inflammation
news_items.description: Twins right-hander Joe Ryan, who was scratched from his spring training start Saturday, was found to have inflammation in his lower back after getting an MRI.

news_items.headline: Yankees' Judge smashes 2 HRs in spring debut, 'excited' about WBC
news_items.description: Yankees slugger Aaron Judge hit two homers in his spring debut Saturday as he gears up for next month's World Baseball Classic with Team USA.

news_items.headline: Aaron Judge blasts 2 HRs for the Yankees
news_items.description: Aaron Judge crushes a homer in the third and fouth inning to pad the Yankees' lead.

news_items.headline: Cardinals sign Ramón Urías to a 1-year deal with option
news_items.description: The St. Louis Cardinals have signed infielder Ramón Urías to a one-year contract with a mutual option for 2027, the team announced on Saturday.

news_items.headline: Dodgers playing Shohei Ohtani in some games before WBC duty
news_items.description: Shohei Ohtani played for the first time in what is expected to be only a couple of Cactus League games for the Dodgers before he departs to join Japan for the World Baseball Classic.

news_items.headline: Bill Mazeroski: 'I got to live a dream' in MLB
news_items.description: After his passing on Friday, we look back at when Bill Mazeroski recounted his famous walk-off home run in the 1960 World Series for the Pirates.
